amendment.description: Amendment restores a reporting requirement on the progress of the Federal Bureau of Investigation in implementing information-sharing principles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in House Report 114-155 to restore a reporting requirement on the progress of the Federal Bureau of Investigation in implementing information-sharing principles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Keating.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
